thread.section_title: Movavi отзывы | Отзывы клиентов о Movavi | www.movavi.com
thread.title: Tariq Abdulla

author: Tariq Abdulla
title: Tariq Abdulla
text:
This is great - you can drag and drop videos, pictures music etc into the timeline and then layer them up - as many as you want more or less.
So if you want, you can sing a duet with yourself.
It also has the "green screen" effect - for removing a background from video if you shoot against a single colour. It's very easy to use; but inevitably you'll get some flecking if you're just doing this in your house; moreso if you can't find any bright colour backgrounds to use.
It's fun to use, and pretty easy.
